app_descript:
App Name: Facebook Pages Manager Package Name: com.facebook.pages.app

Brief

Facebook Pages Manager is a specialized app designed for administrators of Facebook pages to streamline their management and engagement tasks directly from their mobile devices. Aimed at facilitating better interaction with audiences and keeping track of page performance, this app provides tools tailored for business growth and audience engagement.
